TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProcessShutdownReason extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Provides enumerated values that indicate why a process has shut down.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.ProcessShutdownReason DeadlockSuspected = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Indicates that a deadlock was suspected because the response time limit was exceeded with requests in the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.ProcessShutdownReason IdleTimeout = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the process exceeded the allowable idle time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.ProcessShutdownReason MemoryLimitExceeded = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the process exceeded the per-process memory limit.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.ProcessShutdownReason None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the process has not shut down.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.ProcessShutdownReason PingFailed = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the worker process did not respond to a ping from the Internet Information Services (IIS) process.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.ProcessShutdownReason RequestQueueLimit = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates that requests assigned to the process exceeded the allowable number in the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.ProcessShutdownReason RequestsLimit = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that requests executed by the process exceeded the allowable limit.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.ProcessShutdownReason Timeout = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the process restarted because it was active longer than allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.ProcessShutdownReason Unexpected = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the process shut down unexpectedly.
